title: If We Fall: A Dark Romance
description: The thrilling conclusion to the Corrupted Love Trilogy, an epic story of forbidden love by K.M. Scott, New York Times and USA Today bestselling author of the Heart of Stone and Club X Series!I protected Serena from everything I could in her father’s world, but with each horrible act he committed, I knew the time would come when protecting her wouldn’t be enough. When that day came and it was either Robert or me who survived, I did what I had to so the woman I loved and my child were safe.May heaven help me.I used to fight to survive. Then I fought for love. In the end, I fought for family.
author: K.M. Scott
